message.name: ERR_GENERAL_FV_NO_REMOVE_HOH
message.locale: The head of household cannot be removed.

message.name: ERR_FV_NO_MODIFY_RHSIPTOHOH
message.locale: The relationship to head of household cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_FV_NO_MODIFY_PREPAREFOOD
message.locale: The prepare meals together field cannot be modified.

message.name: INF_GENERAL_APPOINTMENT_SCHEDULED
message.locale: An appointment is scheduled for %1s with %2s on %3s.

message.name: ERR_FV_DUPLICATE_MEMBER
message.locale: The participant has already been recorded as part of the household.

message.name: INF_GENERAL_HOUSEHOLD_ELIGIBLE
message.locale: Members of the household are potentially eligible for food stamps benefits.

message.name: INF_GENERAL_HOUSEHOLD_INELIGIBLE
message.locale: The household is ineligible for food stamps benefits.
